data.description: A teen was arrested after police said the high school student made a variety of online threats with a clown persona against area schools.

Someone wearing a mask with green hair approached [a] womanâ€™s car about 3 p.m., reached inside her window, touched her shoulder and then growled at her, the Free Lance-Star reported. No clowns were found.
Three clowns were reported to be harassing elementary school students at recess, prompting a brief lockdown, but police later deemed the report false after students admitted fabricating the claims.
A teen was arrested for making clown threats on Facebook.
Chicago schools officials said theyve received dozens of clown threats or threats related to clowns, though none so far have been deemed credible.

Police said a clown threat against a school posted online Monday was fake, though, according to ABC7, students remained nervous. I used to like them, but after all the scary clown costumes, now I hate them, an 8th grader said.
Some teens were arrested after some clown threats.

There have been several clown sightings around Western Washington, dozens of calls coming into the local authorities. On Tuesday, school officer approached a student at Tahoma High School in Covington who brought a clown mask to campus following social media posts of a clown with a gun. Clown sightings led to school expulsion and school closures around Western Washington.
A series of Facebook threats involving clowns were posted about several schools in the city of Hammond. Police are investigating, but no clowns have been seen.

Campus police at the University of Michigan-Dearborn spotted a man wearing a white clown mask. The university police department issued a warning to be cautious of further clown sightings due to recent activity in Southeast Michigan.
A local posted a picture of a clown spotted behind an ice cream shop across from a cemetery. The clown ran away after the man took the picture.

Early morning on Sunday, Oct. 2, a Clinton Township local posted a video on Twitter of a clown waving at passengers in a car at a car wash: we just saw this clown on cass and moravian. He tried to follow our car. This is getting insane.
An anonymous caller complained to police about a few clowns in the woods.
A resident phoned in a report citing several clowns in the woods flashing green laser lights, though they soon fled. The callers son had also seen ten at one time, the caller told BuzzFeed.
A kid saw a clown outside an apartment complex, while more clowns were reported as seen by a 12-year-old.
Police investigate clown threats. No clowns are found.
In the early morning hours, three separate clown sightings were reported, all with masks and orange and blue hair. No clowns were found.

Students at California State University Northridge were chased by a clown wearing a black jacket, yellow pants, and red hair. Other clown threats and sightings have popped up around Southern, California, and a Fontana teenager was recently arrested for dressing up as a clown and terrorizing multiple cities.
Dixon police officers received calls of clown sightings at Dixon High School. The officers responded, but did not find any clowns.
A teen taken into custody for making a clown threat on social media.
Orono Police posted on Facebook to be aware of any clowns after sightings on Monday night. A local captured the clown on Snapchat, but police did not find any clowns when they went to the site.
A report of someone dressed in a clown costume.

A teenage boy walked around his neighborhood dressed as clown, frightening some locals. Local authorities talked to the boy and took him home. He posted a picture of himself in his clown attire on Facebook with the caption, Living life on the edge.

A seven-year-old boy was attacked by a man dressed as a clown. The clown said he had a knife and ran it against the boys arm. The same night, in a separate incident, two women were approached by three men dressed as clowns holding baseball bats. The police are investigating both cases.
Two people call police to say theyve seen clowns near their homes, including one carrying a machete. No clowns were found.

Police urge residents to stop vigilante searches for clowns. Please dont participate, the police wrote on Facebook. Whether you are out trying to help or looking for an adventure, we ask that you go home.
A child reports that a clown tried to lure him into the woods with candy. No clown is found.
Multiple reports of clown sightings in the area. No clowns were found.
A clown apparently with a gun was photographed on a bridge, though it was unclear if it was a hoax. Police investigated, but no arrests have been made and no clowns have been found.

A man was arrested after posting a picture on Facebook of what he said was a clown in a local park, warning others to stay away. Police said the image was found to be edited, and the man was taken into custody on charges of false reporting.
A Facebook post threatening violence against children by a clown prompts a school lockdown. No clowns are found.
A clown wearing a black cloak, painted white face and black wig appeared out of the bushes, MyCentralJersey.com reported. No clowns were found.
A caller said that theyd seen a clown walking down the side of the road. Police did not find any clowns.
Schools are temporarily placed on lockdown after a threat involving clowns. No clowns are found.

A father said he saw and chased a clown through the woods outside his apartment. The clown was wearing white mask, red curly hair, yellow dotted shirt, blue clown pants and clown shoes, according to FOX8, and got away after a chase.

A woman said she saw a clown staring at her through a fence around 10 p.m. â€œI tried to talk to it,â€ she told KTAR. â€œHe never said anything.â€ She reported the clown to police, but no clowns were found.
A man wearing a black hoodie and clown mask robbed a Walgreens. Armed with a handgun, he stole about $300 to $400 from the cashier.
Juvenile arrested for making clown-related threats.

A woman said she was chased in her apartment building by a clown. Hi, I just got home from work and got out of my car and Iâ€™ve heard so much about this I didnâ€™t even know this was actually true. I just got chased by a clown up into my door of my apartment, the woman told a dispatcher. Police were called, but a clown was never found.
Not trying to die today, said a man who posted a short video of what he said was a clown on the side of the road. No clowns were found.
A lone threat involving a local high school on Facebook along with a picture of a clown is reported to police. No clowns were found.
A woman said that she saw two clowns sitting on railroad tracks staring at her, after her dog started barking at them. No clowns have been found.

A teen told police that a clown with a knife chased him early in the morning as he walked to the school bus. The teen threw a rock at the clown, which then fled. Police later investigated but found no clown.
A clown chased down and intentionally scared some children, according to a post on Facebook by police. No arrests made.
Multiple people, including a man fishing with his children, report of seeing clowns. No clowns are found.
A cop spends a day investigating clown rumors, coming up empty-handed, though detailing his quest in an epic Facebook post.
Police release a statement about a viral text, calling it harmless. The Clown Rumor is just that ... a viral rumor.
A woman reported seeing someone wearing a clown mask with teeth, after she left work around 10:30 p.m. No clowns were found.
A man claims that someone dressed as a creepy clown was looking into his windows late at night. No clowns are found.
A boy wearing a clown-like mask was stabbed to death, with a suspect charged in his murder. It remains unclear what prompted the killing.

A man was arrested after allegedly calling police, claiming that he was the who has been threatening children, and then making a series of lewd comments and threats. No evidence, however, that the man was indeed a clown.
A man wearing big clown shoes and a yellow outfit with red polka dots chased after a teen girl, according to the Tampa Bay Times. The clown was never found.
Three people reported separate clown sightings, including a father who said his children were chased by one after they got off the school bus. No clowns are found.
Two people said theyd seen clowns in the town, though police were never able to confirm the sightings.
Multiple clown threats on social media are reported acros the Fort Worth area, with one teen arrested after creating a fake Twitter account she described as a prank on a friend.
Schools officials say theyve gotten clown threats over social media, which they later call hoaxes.
A few sightings reported, though none found, which has the county sheriff in a bad move. â€œI think itâ€™s in poor taste, the sheriff said.

Some children reported seeing two clowns in the woods during a little league baseball game. When police conducted a search, they found two Halloween masks hanging from a tree. The whole incident came a few days after a man said he was attacked by clowns in the same town. No clowns were ever found.
Police urge residents to not wear clown costumes for Halloween, in the wake of nationwide hysteria.
A man dressed as a clown was behind some Facebook harassment, the county sheriffs office said. No arrests have been made.
A few clowns have been sighted in recent days, police say on Facebook, without going into detail, though no clowns have been found.
Schools officials issue a statement they are looking into clown threats, though no clowns, so far, have been found.
A clown was spotted walking outside of a Subway restaurant.
A 10-year-old arrested for making clown threats.

Bomb-sniffing dogs were called in to a school after a threat generated from yesterdays clown incidents, an officer identifying himself as Lt Plitt Aka Pappa Smurf wrote on Facebook. No bombs or clowns were found.
Various clown threats surface on social media, though police deem none of them credible.
A driver told cops he was confronted by a clown on a road at night. No clowns were found.
Two students charged after clown threats on social media were made, prompting extra security at a local high school.
Some schools were placed on lockdown after police said theyd become aware of clown threats on Facebook. No clowns were found.
A 12-year-old told a local TV station that a clown attacked her and yelled obscenities, but police find no evidence that happened. No clowns are found.
A resident said theyd seen a clown in mid-afternoon wearing all pink clothing, red wig, red nose and red, white and blue shoes. No clowns were found.
Witnesses reported seeing two clowns in the early hours, one in all black, and another dressed in gold. No clowns are found.
Clown threats against schools reported, but no clowns emerge.
Clown threats reported on social media.
Police said that at least two people had called, saying they had seen clowns and were frightened. No clowns were found.
Some school were placed on lockdown Facebook clown threats and some reported sightings of clowns. No clowns were found.

A woman said she spotted a clown near her apartment complex. â€œHe had on all black â€” he had a black and white mask on with clown hair, and he was just staring at us, making noises, trying to get our attention, she told WUFT. Police could not find any clowns.
Someone calling themselves Clowny Headsmasher makes a variety of threats on social media, prompting school officials to release a statement. No arrests have been made.
An extremely afraid 10-year-old was found by police hiding between houses after he said he was approached by three clowns. No clowns were found.

Two clowns snuck up on a woman at an elementary school. They didnt say nothing. All you can see were the eyes, and they were just standing there like zombies, side by side not saying nothing, no emotions, just standing there, the woman told ABC7. The clowns later fled and were not found.
A woman said she saw a clown in the woods near her workplace. Police responded, but found no clown.
A group of girls reported being chased by a knife-wielding clown as they made their way to their school bus in the morning. Police investigated, but no clowns were found.
Four teens were arrested after clown threats were posted to Instagram and Facebook.
A woman told police she saw a clown lingering outside of her store. Police responded but no clowns were found.

A mother said that a man in a clown suitâ€”but lacking face paint or a maskâ€”attempted to abduct her 1-year-old after they finished eating breakfast at Dennys. She kicked the clown, he ran, and has not been found.
A teen was arrested after police said she contacted someone online with a clown as their profile picture and asked them to kill one of her teachers.
A man told police hed been jumped and shot by a bunch of clowns, though he later admitted that he was actually shot by a stranger, in what appeared to be a drug deal gone wrong.

A teen was arrested after what police said was a series of bizarre clown-related incidents and threats, including a faked 911 call, threats against classmates, and two clown sightings, including one clown who was carrying a knife.
A woman claims to have been attacked by a clown, who also made threats against a local school. No clown was found.
Woman arrested after falsely reporting a clown attack.
Police investigate clown threats online as a video purporting to show a clown in local park surfaces on Youtube. No clowns were found.

A man was cited by police after he drove his 18-year-old sonâ€”who sat on the front hood and donned a clown costumeâ€”around the township in a hearse, apparently for laughs, as they are both fans of Halloween. I know I should have known better, the father said after.
Two teens arrested for putting on clown masks and chasing young children, police said.
Two children spotted, ran away from what they said was a clown. No clowns were found.
Eight different reports of clown sightings at York College, including one reporting a car full of clowns. No clowns are found.
Four different reports of middle schoolers being chased by a clown or seeing a clown. No clowns were found.
Reports of clowns jumping in front of cars; no clowns found.
A clown popped out in traffic, a female caller reported. No clowns were found.
Penn State students embark on a massive clown hunt after numerous sightings. Fuck them clowns, the students chanted. No clowns were found.
Two are arrested after cops receive several false reports of clowns in a van.
Four arrested after a Facebook page warns that a clown would threaten local children.
Cops title a Facebook post ***CLOWN SITUATION*** before detailing that there in fact have not been any clowns seen.
Children report seeing clowns, later admit they fabricated their claims. No clowns were found.
An anonymous caller falsely reports a clown outside a school.

A man claimed that he was attacked at 3:55 a.m. by two clowns, one of whom stole a baseball bat he had with him and hit him with it. The suspects are described as having painted white faces. One suspect may have been bald with a beard and black diamonds painted around both eyes, according to a report from WHIO. The other clown suspect may have had long hair. [Police Chief Richard] Butts said police checked the area and didnâ€™t find anyone clowning around.
Four arrested after an alleged elaborate hoax including two of them putting on clown masks for a photo, which then went viral on social media. The stunt began as a prank intended to scare a friend.
Two girls said theyd encountered two clowns on the way to school. The clowns left in a black van and havent been found.
Several report to police they have seen clowns. Police investigate, but no clowns are found.
In a Facebook post, police urge residents not to shoot random clowns, though none have been spotted.
A clown walking the streets and carrying black balloons is later revealed to be a marketing stunt for a movie.
Officers say a few overnight sightings of clowns were reported, but no clowns were found.
Multiple people on the campus of Wilmington College said they saw a clown, prompting college officials to release a statement. No clown was ever found.
Witnesses told police they had seen a clown walking around. No clowns were found.
High schools briefly locked down after clown threats made on social media.
A woman told the Oregonian shed seen someone in black clothing, black gloves and a silver clown mask who approached her, and banged on the windows of her car. No clowns were found.
Man wearing a clown mask and carrying explosives robs a bank. No suspects have been arrested.
Several Houston-area schools amp up security after various clown threats emerge online. No arrests have been made.
A clown or clowns were spotted in four separate incidents, but, so far, no clowns have been found.
Several clowns are reported spotted across the Dallas area, in addition to clown threats agsinst some schools, prompting officials to investigate. No clowns were found.
A driver tells police that a clown caused a car wreck on a rural highway. Police search, but no clowns were found.
Elementary school students reported seeing clowns outside their school. No clowns were found.
Children say they were chased by a clown wearing all black and a mask. No clowns were found.
Witnesses said that a man dressed as a clown was chasing people on a main street in town. Police responded, but no clowns were found.
A small-town police chief reported seeing a someone wearing a mask, a multi-colored wig and overalls, according to USA Today. But the clown scampered away and was never caught.

A 25-year-old in a Walmart parking lot was arrested after numerous people called police to say theyd spotted him. He said it was merely just for fun though, with Halloween coming up. Its not illegal to scare people, the man, dressed in face paint and a checkered suit, told a cop in a patrol car.
A 20-year-old man in a clown outfit and masked was arrested after he was spotted crouched in a wooded area by an apartment complex. He was arrested and charged with causing public alarm.
